column2: "EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔbaa Jeremia hɔ wɔ nsuwew no ho."
"Juda reka mbɔɔ
column3: na n’aponkɛse eguragura
column4: wofurafura eyitam tsetse daadze; na Jerusalɛm ne nkekamu afow kɔ sor."

column2: "Na hɔn ekunyin no soma hɔn asomfo no esukɔ: wɔba mburaba do
column3: naaso wonnya nsu; wɔdzedze hɔn ahyera pan san kɔ: hɔn enyi ato na hɔn enyim egu ase

column2: "Osiandɛ daadze apaapaa wɔ nsu a ɔnntɔ nngu asaase do ntsi
column3: ekuafo abaw egura

column2: "Nyew
column3: kwaa mu ɔwansan so ɔwo na ɔdan ne mba gya

column2: "Na sar do nsoasopɔnkɔ gyinagyina mpampaa pataa no do
column3: wɔhaahaw mframa ho dɛ ɔsɔ: hɔn enyiwa ayeyɛ nkusunkusu

column2: "Kaansa hɛn emumuyɛ dzi dase tsia hɛn mpo a
column3: EWURADZE
column5: yɛ ho bi: hɛn ekyirsan adɔɔ so; na yɛayɛ bɔn etsia wo."

column2: "Ɔwo Israel enyidado
column3: hɔn agyenkwa wɔ ɔfona ber mu
column4: ebɛnadze ntsi na eyɛ dɛ ɔmamforanyi wɔ asaase no do
column5: dɛ ɔkwantsennyi a ɔman kɔsoɛ anadwe da kor yi?"

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ayɛ dɛ barimba a no bo etu
column3: dɛ katakyi a onntum nkwa gye yi? Naaso ɔwo
column6: na wɔdze wo dzin frɛ hɛn; mma nndan hɛn nngya."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se ɔman yi nye yi
column3: Ampa wɔapɛ dɛ wokyimakyima; woennsianka hɔn anan: dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE nngye hɔn yi; afei na ɔbɛkaa hɔn emumuyɛ na ɔabɛma hɔn bɔn asotwe."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column3: Mma mmbɔ mpaa mma ɔman yi hɔn yie."

column2: "Sɛ wodzi mbuada mpo a
column3: minnketsie hɔn sufrɛ; na sɛ wɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr na edziban afɔr a
column4: m’enyi ronnsɔ: na mbom medze afona
column6: na ɔyardɔm na medze bɛhyew hɔn."

column2: "Nna mesee dɛ
column3: Ao EWURADZE Nyankopɔn hwɛ
column6: eso hom rinndzi kɔm; mbom mebɛma hom asomdwee a osi pi wɔ bea yi do."

column2: "Nna EWURADZE see me dɛ
column3: Nkɔnhyɛfo no hyɛ nkɔntor wɔ me dzin mu: nnyɛ emi bi mosomaa hɔn
column5: eso mennkasaa mennkyerɛɛ hɔn: ator enyiwado adzehu
column8: na hɔn akoma mu ndaadaa na wɔhyɛ ho nkɔm kyerɛ hom."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE se wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo a wɔdze me dzin hyɛ nkɔm
column3: na nnyɛ emi bi mosomaa hɔn
column5: Afona na ɔkɔm remmba asaase yi do no
column6: nye yi: Afona na ɔkɔm na wɔdze bɛhyew nkɔnhyɛfo no."

column2: "Na ɔman a wɔhyɛ nkɔm kyerɛ hɔn no wɔbɔtotow hɔn egugu Jerusalɛm abrɔn no mu wɔ ɔkɔm na afona no ntsi; na wonnkenya obi ma woesie hɔn
column3: hɔnara
column5: anaa hɔn mbabaa: na mubohue hɔn emumuyɛ egu hɔn etsifi."

column2: "Na dɛm nsɛm yi ka kyerɛ hɔn
column3: dɛ; Wɔmma m’enyiwa mporoporow nyinsuwa anadwe na adzekyee
column4: na mma wonngyaa da; osiandɛ me babaa ɔbaabun no

column2: "Sɛ mifir edzi mokɔ hamu a
column3: nna hwɛ afona ano atɔfo! Na sɛ mekɛhɛn kurow mu a
column5: hɔn a wɔyaryar ɔkɔm yarba nye yi! Na nkɔnhyɛnyi na ɔsɔfo nyina wokyin asaase no do

column2: "Aso apow Juda korakora? Aso Zion ho ayɛ wo kra nkɔw? Ɔyɛ dɛn na abɔ hɛn
column3: na ɔyarsa bi nnyi hɔ ma hɛn yi? Yɛhwɛ asomdwee kwan
column4: naaso papa biara mmba; na ɔyarsa ber kwan

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: yɛgye hɛn emumuyɛ to mu hɛn egyanom hɔn ndzeyɛbɔn no: na yɛayɛ bɔn etsia wo."

column2: "Wo dzin ntsi mma nnkyir hɛn; mma nngu w’enyimnyam ahengua no enyim ase: kaakaa
column3: na mma nnto w’ahyɛmu a ɔda yɛnye wo ntamu no."

column2: "Aso amanamamfo hɔn egyangyandze mu bi wɔ hɔ a obotum ama nsu atɔ? Ana aso ɔsorsor botum ama esusow etue? Ana nnyɛ ɔwo a
column3: ao EWURADZE
column4: hɛn Nyankopɔn? Dɛm ntsi ɔwo na yɛhwɛ wo kwan
column5: osiandɛ ɔwo na ayɛ ndzɛmba yinom nyinara."
